channel.title: LéaDelin on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in LéaDelin on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – August 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in August 2023.

item.title: Freelance Developer and Translator: Meet SNor42
item.description: Have you ever wondered who’s hiding behind a Crowdin username? It’s time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project.

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – May 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in May.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 is ready for translation
item.description: PrestaShop’s 8.1 beta release was announced a few months ago. The stable release is now just around the corner. While it brings new features, a new version also means new strings. A file containing all 8.1 strings has been pushed to Crowdin, and is ready for translation!

item.description: Have you ever wondered who’s hiding behind a GitHub username? It’s time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project.
